entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
